title: My Location, GPS Location Finder
description:
My Location, GPS Location Finder  will help to find current location and nearby places. Now finding the current location is very easy.
This app has below options
1) Live Location: Here user can check only his live location or current location on map. It becomes easy now to find his current location by using this app.
2) Live Address: Also helps for live mobile address . User can easily locate his Live Mobile Address.  Also can locate their Live Mobile Address on the Map.
3) Places near me helps to find nearby Restaurants, Banks, ATM's, pubs etc.
4) By using distance calculator you can able to calculate distance between any two locations on the map.
This Application required your Mobile GPS to fetch your current location known as gps location. This will only be used to show your location on the Mobile.
